Text: I have to say that your encodings are the best that I have ever seen.  I know that it takes lots of time but I appreciate it.  Keep it up! Do you take requests from time to time?

This will keep me entertained before going to bed tonight.

PS: If you like this torrent, don't forget to click on the +1, this applies to any other torrent, it's a way to say thanks to the uploader for his effort.

you're welcome everyone.

@DoubleR46 - you're can make requests. Understand that my time is very limited for the next few weeks and everything about these process -- from the downloading, ripping, encoding, and packaging -- takes way too much time. But who knows, I might get to a title here 'n there. :)
Your movie uploads are great, if you have the Transformers trilogy can you please upload them!!!
